message: Accept my generous offer and we can call it a day!
You're not as generous as you thought, are you? I'll take this.
Meet me halfway, Bob! Let's make a deal!
You're not meeting me halfway, so I'll meet you somewhere in between!
Getting closer, Bob! Let's shake on it!
I'm not shaking on it yet, Alice. I want more!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's make a deal!
Compromise? You call that compromise? I'm not falling for it!
Fine, Bob. I'll give you a bit more. But don't expect me to go any further!
You think you're giving me a bit more? I'm not buying it!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Fine, Alice. I'll take it. You're not getting any more from me.
